chapter.title: The Docker Plugin
chapter.para: The Docker plugin provides additional means of manipulating docked windows.

The following is a list of features provided by Docker:
Auto Hiding Docks. Individual docks can be set to auto hide when the text area has the focus. Additionally, certain docks can be configured to not be hidden.
Toggle Docks. A shortcut can be created to toggle visible on and off.
Dockable Window Popup A shortcut can be created to popup a list of windows of a given dock. If the shortcut contains a modifier (Ctrl, Shift, Alt), Docker will allow you to cycle through dockables (much like Window's Alt+Tab feature) until that modifier is released.
